short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The quickest and easiest way to get your colleagues to like your LinkedIn posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Getting your colleagues involved with your LinkedIn marketing.

Get likes from your team in just one click thanks to our Chrome extension.


How it works?

1. Ask your team to like a post
2. Posts are automatically liked by your teammates
3. Boost your reach on LinkedIn
